divs: sighting detailsi have beeb seeing these things for 6 months now and tonight at 9:30 pm i took my dog out and i looked up to see if i could see these objects again . i am a little skeptic and lately i have been seeing more .when i looked up i seen the first object moving parallel to highway 219 heading north it looked like a star moving ,not a falling star cause i seen one of those tonight and the star was going faster than these objects ,it was round white and there were no strobing lights on it it flew north and as i watched it, the object stopped and the vanished . as i was watching the sky a plane flew over(9:45 pm) it had red and white strobing lights and looked nothing like the previous object moving slower than the objects . at around 9:55 i seen two objects cossing over my house white ,round ,star like one was heading north bound parrallel to 219 and the other one heading east looked like they were going to crash in the sky thats how close they looked to each other from were i was . i dont like reporting these things . awhile back i seen several of these objects flying over and one night i was out looking up i seen two black helicopters no markings on them fly over my house they were so low i could see 2 people in the each cock pit a purple light illuminating the cockpit and i seen several men in the back of the choppers they looked like black hawks . i reported the sightings and the choppers to a well known ufo man and he did email me saying he checked and there was nothing going on that night . a week later 2 men went to my x wifes house looking for me ,x wifes boyfriend said he opened the door and the one man in plane clothes kept repeating is [cms\tg\pid] here we have a package for him ,the boyfriend said he doesnt live here and he didnt tell them were to find me . later that day my brother called me he said that night around 8 pm a man called and said are you [cms\tg\pid] he said no and they said we need to find him we have a package for him repating it my brother asked him who he was he just repeated the same thing . my brother gave him an adress to a house i bought to fix up and the man said i was there and no one is there it is empty and there is no power there ,which there wasnt . so my brother gave im my number and said call him first and he didnt tell him were i lived .i lived in house and i never changed my adress from the empty house . i even called the police to see if there were any other reports like this and the police said it coundnt of been a legal mater that i would of got a letter and the men would of identified themselves by law. they would of never called after hours. they were in plane clothes and noone seen what they were driving .kept reapting themselves . i dont know if this was connected to the first time i reported someting but it is kind of weird . i am a little skeptic but what i have been seeing i cant explain and i dont have a high quility video camera i tried and its too far away . can you help
trends: There have been no other sightings in St Marys
This sighting has never been favorited.
